text: One day a whore came into an actor's house, and after checking his utensils, she found, among many other things, an artistically crafted mask. He took her by the feet, looked at her, and said to himself, "Happy head! But it's a shame he doesn't have brains. Don't fill yourself with empty looks. You always better fill yourself with good judgment.
title: La zorra y la careta vacía
author: nan Esopo
